ygData.subject: RE: RE: Harmonic's Distorted view of Dragon Raids (and  some P.S.'s for Sylly)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You obviously passed the invisible check that all high level characters get which makes them harder to cast stuff on.  Don t worry, the resist message will
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 6 Jan 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:

> i get the resist message as expected, and other times i get the message that
> i lose control of myself and i have the fear icon, but there is no effect
> (i.e. i am undoubtedly not feared). what's up with that?

You obviously passed the invisible check that all high level characters
get which makes them harder to cast stuff on. Don't worry, the resist
message will be added in a forthcoming patch.

Athren
